articles.description: Rory McIlroy started fast at Southern Hills with a 65 on Thursday, but beginning well at tournaments has previously been a struggle for the Northern Irishman.
articles.content:
Rory McIlroy joked that he'd rather be battling to make the cut after setting Southern Hills alight in the first round of the PGA Championship.
McIlroy hasn't won a major championship since 2014 and… [+1609 chars]
